trans-unit.source: Specifies whether <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager" /> and <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.ScriptReference" /> objects refer to the debug or release version of client scripts.
trans-unit.target: Specifica se gli oggetti <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager" /> e <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.ScriptReference" /> fanno riferimento alla versione di debug o rilascio degli script client.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptMode> enumeration provides values for setting the version of client script to use on a Web page.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptMode> enumerazione fornisce valori per l'impostazione della versione dello script client da utilizzare in una pagina Web.

trans-unit.source: The enumeration values can be applied to either the <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager.ScriptMode%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property or to the [ScriptReference.ScriptMode](<xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptReferenceBase.ScriptMode%2A>) property.
trans-unit.target: I valori di enumerazione possono essere applicati al <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager.ScriptMode%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> proprietà o il [ScriptReference](<xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptReferenceBase.ScriptMode%2A>) proprietà.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager> object sets the version for all scripts on the page unless it is overridden by a <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptReference> object.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager> oggetto imposta la versione per tutti gli script nella pagina, a meno che non venga sottoposto a override da un <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptReference> oggetto.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptReference> object sets the version for a particular script.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptReference> la versione per uno script specifico di set di oggetti.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptMode.Auto?displayProperty=nameWithType> value produces different results depending on whether it refers to a standalone script file or to a script file that is embedded as a resource in an assembly.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptMode.Auto?displayProperty=nameWithType> valore produce risultati diversi a seconda che faccia riferimento a un file di script autonomo o in un file di script incorporati come risorsa in un assembly.

trans-unit.source: A standalone script file is defined with the [ScriptReference.Path](<xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptReferenceBase.Path%2A>) property.
trans-unit.target: Un file script autonomo viene definito con il [ScriptReference.Path](<xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptReferenceBase.Path%2A>) proprietà.

trans-unit.source: An assembly reference must be accessed through the <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptReference.Name%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptReference.Assembly%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: Un riferimento all'assembly deve essere accessibili mediante il <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptReference.Name%2A> e <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptReference.Assembly%2A> proprietà.

trans-unit.source: The results for the <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptMode.Auto?displayProperty=nameWithType> value are as follows:
trans-unit.target: I risultati per il <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptMode.Auto?displayProperty=nameWithType> valore sono i seguenti:

trans-unit.source: When it is applied to a standalone script file where the [ScriptReference.Path]<xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptReferenceBase.Path%2A> property is specified, the <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptMode.Auto?displayProperty=nameWithType> value is equivalent to <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptMode.Release?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: Quando viene applicata a un file di script autonomo in cui [ScriptReference.Path]<xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptReferenceBase.Path%2A> proprietà viene specificata, il <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptMode.Auto?displayProperty=nameWithType> valore è equivalente a <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptMode.Release?displayProperty=nameWithType>.

trans-unit.source: When it is applied to a script reference in an assembly, <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptMode.Auto?displayProperty=nameWithType> is equivalent to <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptMode.Inherit?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: Quando viene applicato a un riferimento a script in un assembly, <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptMode.Auto?displayProperty=nameWithType> equivale a <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptMode.Inherit?displayProperty=nameWithType>.

trans-unit.source: When only <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptReference.Name%2A> is specified, it is used to reference the script.
trans-unit.target: Quando solo <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptReference.Name%2A> viene specificato, viene utilizzato per fare riferimento allo script.

trans-unit.source: When <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptReference.Name%2A> and the [ScriptReference.Path]<xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptReferenceBase.Path%2A> property are both specified, the [ScriptReference.Path]<xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptReferenceBase.Path%2A> property is used instead of <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptReference.Name%2A>, but the <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptMode.Auto?displayProperty=nameWithType> value is still equivalent to <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptMode.Inherit?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: Quando <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptReference.Name%2A> [ScriptReference.Path] e<xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptReferenceBase.Path%2A> proprietà sono entrambi specificato, [ScriptReference.Path]<xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptReferenceBase.Path%2A> proprietà viene usata invece di <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptReference.Name%2A>, ma la <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptMode.Auto?displayProperty=nameWithType> valore è sempre equivalente a <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptMode.Inherit?displayProperty=nameWithType>.

trans-unit.source: An error is thrown if the requested version of the script does not exist.
trans-unit.target: Se la versione richiesta dello script non esiste, viene generato un errore.

trans-unit.source: For instance, an error is thrown if a reference is made to a standalone script file that is named CustomScript.js and the <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager.ScriptMode%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property is set to <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptMode.Debug?displayProperty=nameWithType>, but CustomScript.debug.js does not exist on the site.
trans-unit.target: Ad esempio, viene generato un errore se un riferimento a un file di script autonomo denominato CustomScript e <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager.ScriptMode%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> è impostata su <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptMode.Debug?displayProperty=nameWithType>, ma CustomScript.debug.js non esiste nel sito.

trans-unit.source: References to scripts in an assembly return the release version if the debug version does not exist.
trans-unit.target: I riferimenti agli script in un assembly restituiscono la versione finale se la versione di debug non esiste.

trans-unit.source: When the `retail` attribute of the [deployment](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/dbcc2c62-3159-4a62-9f1e-8cfe3b8b09dc) element of the Machine.config file is set to `true`, the release versions of client scripts are used throughout the Web site.
trans-unit.target: Quando il `retail` attributo del [distribuzione](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/dbcc2c62-3159-4a62-9f1e-8cfe3b8b09dc) del file Machine. config è impostato su `true`, le versioni finali di script client vengono utilizzate in tutto il sito Web.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptMode> values in the <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager.ScriptMode%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> and [ScriptReference.ScriptMode](<xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptReferenceBase.ScriptMode%2A>) properties are ignored.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptMode> i valori di <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager.ScriptMode%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> e [ScriptReference](<xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptReferenceBase.ScriptMode%2A>) proprietà vengono ignorate.

trans-unit.source: The following example shows a page where the script versions are declaratively set to Release in the <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager> control, but one script named CustomClient.js is declaratively set to Debug in the <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptReference.Name%2A> control.
trans-unit.target: L'esempio seguente mostra una pagina in cui le versioni di script sono impostate in modo dichiarativo alla versione nel <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager> il controllo, ma uno script denominato CustomClient. js in modo dichiarativo è impostata su Debug nel <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptReference.Name%2A> controllo.

trans-unit.source: In the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager" /> control, the version of client scripts to use is determined at run time based on the application-level [<compilation>](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/7c319582-074a-4d2a-a787-03b9d4541c12) element of the Web.config file, unless it is overridden in an instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.ScriptReference" /> control.
trans-unit.target: Nel controllo <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager" />, la versione degli script client da usare è determinata in fase di esecuzione in base all'elemento [<compilation>](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/7c319582-074a-4d2a-a787-03b9d4541c12) a livello di applicazione del file Web.config, a meno che non ne sia stato eseguito l'override in un'istanza di controllo<see cref="T:System.Web.UI.ScriptReference" />.

trans-unit.source: In the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.ScriptReference" /> control, when applied to a standalone script file, <see cref="F:System.Web.UI.ScriptMode.Auto" /> is equivalent to <see cref="F:System.Web.UI.ScriptMode.Release" />.
trans-unit.target: Nel controllo <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.ScriptReference" />, se applicato a un file di script autonomo, <see cref="F:System.Web.UI.ScriptMode.Auto" /> equivale a <see cref="F:System.Web.UI.ScriptMode.Release" />.

trans-unit.source: When applied to a script reference in an assembly, <see cref="F:System.Web.UI.ScriptMode.Auto" /> is equivalent to <see cref="F:System.Web.UI.ScriptMode.Inherit" />.
trans-unit.target: Se applicato a un riferimento di script in un assembly, <see cref="F:System.Web.UI.ScriptMode.Auto" /> equivale a <see cref="F:System.Web.UI.ScriptMode.Inherit" />.

trans-unit.source: In the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager" /> control, the debug version of the client script is used on the Web page unless overridden in an instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.ScriptReference" /> control.
trans-unit.target: Nel controllo <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager" />, nella pagina Web viene usata la versione di debug dello script client, a meno che non ne sia stato eseguito l'override in un'istanza del controllo <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.ScriptReference" />.

trans-unit.source: In the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.ScriptReference" /> control, the debug version of the client script is used on the Web page.
trans-unit.target: Nel controllo <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.ScriptReference" />, nella pagina Web viene usata la versione di debug dello script client.

trans-unit.source: In the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager" /> control, <see cref="F:System.Web.UI.ScriptMode.Inherit" /> is equivalent to <see cref="F:System.Web.UI.ScriptMode.Auto" />.
trans-unit.target: Nel controllo <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager" />, <see cref="F:System.Web.UI.ScriptMode.Inherit" /> equivale a <see cref="F:System.Web.UI.ScriptMode.Auto" />.

trans-unit.source: In the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.ScriptReference" /> control, the <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager.ScriptMode" /> value from <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager" /> determines which version of the client script to use.
trans-unit.target: Nel controllo <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.ScriptReference" />, il valore <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager.ScriptMode" /> ricavato da <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager" /> determina la versione dello script client da usare.

trans-unit.source: In the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager" /> control, the release version of the client script is used on the Web page unless overridden by setting the <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.ScriptReference.ScriptMode" /> property of a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.ScriptReference" /> instance to <see cref="F:System.Web.UI.ScriptMode.Debug" />.
trans-unit.target: Nel controllo <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager" />, nella pagina Web viene usata la versione di rilascio dello script client, a meno che non ne sia stato eseguito l'override impostando la proprietà <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.ScriptReference.ScriptMode" /> di un'istanza di <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.ScriptReference" /> su <see cref="F:System.Web.UI.ScriptMode.Debug" />.

trans-unit.source: In the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.ScriptReference" /> control, the release version of the client script is used on the Web page.
trans-unit.target: Nel controllo <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.ScriptReference" />, nella pagina Web viene usata la versione di rilascio dello script client.
